definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: Romania in the Balkans northeast of South-Eastern Europe.
sentences.chinese: 罗马尼亚位于东南欧巴尔干半岛东北部。

sentences.english: Demography is causing alarm in many Balkan countries.
sentences.chinese: 人口政治学正使得许多巴尔干半岛国家惊慌。

sentences.english: Albania in the Balkans in South-Eastern Europe the West Bank.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔巴尼亚位于东南欧巴尔干半岛西岸。

sentences.english: ' If you ask, 'Where do the Balkans begin?
sentences.chinese: 如果你问，“巴尔干半岛从哪里开始呢？”

sentences.english: This year the firm entered the Balkans and Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 今年，该公司进驻巴尔干半岛各国和蒙古国。

sentences.english: An ancient region of the Balkan Peninsula on the Adriatic coast.
sentences.chinese: 古代沿巴尔干半岛亚德里亚海岸一地区。
